name: mytunes
short_description: mytunes - A sweet mp3 (and later other formats) player, made to be used in a GNUstep, or other OpenStep/NeXTSTEP/Cocoa-like environments.  Offers wonderous playlist support, including superlists, which are similar to smart lists.
